title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, upsets, Cardinals
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, upsets, Cardinals
description:
Where Colin was right and wrong

What to make of the NFL upsets over the weekend

The Cardinals realized they made a mistake and now they're the best team in the league


Guest: Greg Olsen
